pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Python API for AirSimThis package contains Python APIs for [Game of Drones: A NeurIPS 2019 Competition](https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim-NeurIPS2019-Drone-Racing), built on [Microsoft AirSim](https://github.com/microsoft/AirSim)## DependenciesThis package depends on `msgpack` and would automatically install `msgpack-rpc-python` (this may need administrator/sudo prompt):```pip install msgpack-rpc-python```
